Html:
Hi,

i use this class to create an excel file from a data selection of some mySql tables, and normally all goes well.

In some cases  when i try to enlarge the selection, always i look this message:

ERROR

The requested URL could not be retrieved

While trying to retrieve the URL: http://www.prova1.int/webc/MailNew/presenze/report/report.php

The following error was encountered:

  • Zero Sized Reply

Squid did not receive any data for this request.

Your cache administrator is root.

Generated Wed, 03 Jun 2009 17:04:21 GMT by sethi.senior (squid/2.5.STABLE14)
 
I would to know if this is bug or i must to cange some setting on my server. 
Thank You

Not sure about the Squid error, but if this is only happens when data size increases, then it is like PHPExcel that is the cause.

Try to download latest source code from here and report back the results:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/SourceControl/ListDownloadableCommits.aspx

Tank you,

but the problem is always the same, also with lastest source code.

I tried with an other server from differents clients, but i have always the same message.

i'm trying to change system/Php settings, now.

Thank You
How many sheets, rows, columns does the Excel file you are trying to generate contain?
